website_summaries.verdict: Weightless, mostly organic spray with SPF 30.
pros: Keeps makeup in place all day
Reduces shine and offers UV protection
Cucumber and aloe vera extracts soothe and refresh skin
cons: A lot of problems with the spray nozzle clogging up and spraying unevenly

customer_reviews.title: Made my entire face swell up
customer_reviews.text: Be careful. This made my face itch and swell up. Swelling was so bad I was on benadryl and cortisone cream for 2 days. I could barely open my eyes
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I want to love this product because it is a setting spray and ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product because it is a setting spray and SPF all in one. However, my first jar arrived and it would not spray. The second one leaked. When I got it to work, I feel like it made my face a little too wet. Perhaps there is something I am doing wrong but for this price, the product should work right out of the box and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: JOJO

customer_reviews.title: Max Skin Protection
customer_reviews.text: Skin cancer runs in my family so sunscreen has always been very important to me. This is a little strong for some but it gives a full protection. I'm very picky about what I use and so is my dermatologist (also having adult acne makes me more cautious). Recommendations...... .... If the smell is to strong use a rose water facial spray after. Not only is Rose water amazing for your skin- the light smell is very refreshing. .... If it clogs run the nozzle under hot water. I do this every cpl days to prevent that from happing
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Clogs easily and smells like nail polish remover
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this. I layer on as many SPF products as I can, but this product sprays in large blobs (not a mist at all) and smells as if I'm inhaling toxic chemicals. It feels like I'm spraying acetate all over my face.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: When they list Alcohol (organic) as the 1st ingredient, PAY ATTENTION!
customer_reviews.text: I was so horribly overwhelmed by the blast of alcohol the first time I used this product that I would simply never use it again. And yes, I did shake it first.
customer_reviews.author: Siddha108

customer_reviews.title: Move along...
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful and stings my skin. Also, it does not mist the face at all, it just comes out in chunky squirts. I meant to sent this back but never got around to it.
customer_reviews.author: B.Jo

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but dispenser clogs.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, especially the fact that I could refresh my sunblock right over my makeup! However, the sprayer clogged much too easily and this caused the product to leak out a bit when I was carrying it in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan Dork

customer_reviews.title: Cracked bottle
customer_reviews.text: There was a slight crack in the bottle when it arrived. It didn’t seem large enough to need to return, however, when I pulled the cap off it cracked a bit more and I lost grip and it spilled all over - no more product:(
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany C.

customer_reviews.title: sticky and gross feeling
customer_reviews.text: I have heard a lot about this company and considering it was natural, I wanted to give it a try. Unfortunately, I did not like this product at all ): The first time I wore it, I sprayed it on my face (some got on my hair) and it made my hair have this extremely sticky feeling that made my hair feel like straw. If it got on my skin from falling down, it would make me very sticky and I would have to wash my body off. I am just not a fan at all. I would only use if I had my hair up in a towel and was covered in clothing from my head to my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Madesyn Murray

customer_reviews.title: Off label use for me
customer_reviews.text: This stuff did set my makeup very nicely, but man, it triggered some of the WORST rosacea flare ups, it stings, and it’s rather heavily fragranced, which I’m not fond of. Frankly, I use this the day before I go see my dermatologist for laser treatments because it is super predictable at causing flare ups, making my sessions super effective (6 treatments every 4 years).
customer_reviews.author: S. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, not a fan of the glass packaging though
customer_reviews.text: I actually super LOVE this product! However, I have carpal tunnel syndrome and therefore drop things frequently so the glass packaging was broken a few days after I received the product and at the price I feel like its a major bummer to replace it after only a few uses 😭
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Rasmusson

customer_reviews.title: Might as well spray your face with hairspray and smash a bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn’t set your make up, it just makes you look greasy and smell like hair spray and piles all your make up up in your creases. And also the new packaging, just broke for no reason. I picked it up, in the box, kind of quickly I guess?? And the bottle just broke. So I’d say it’s a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SPF?
customer_reviews.text: it doesn't seem to work very well for actual SPF... and kinda smells like your spraying alcohol on your face... not very hydrating really either. WAS SUPER EXCITED ABOUT IT... slightly cant say its the best.
customer_reviews.author: libbez

customer_reviews.title: GAVE ME A RASH!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the item for my wife since she does her make up and we live in Texas where the sun try’s to kill you, so she tried the product for 2-3 days and she started to develop a rash from her chin to her neck and just got worse the more she used it, she stopped after the 3rd day and it started going away slowly. Definitely want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Marco P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Protection and Preservation!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. It does help preserve my make up for longevity and protects from the sun. Quick tip, when applying, keep your eyes closed for a few seconds after you are done spraying. It is uncomfortable if it gets in your eyes. I love the packaging. The scent is ok... it just smells like a coconut sunscreen scent. I also like that the bottle has a shaker ball, because I often forget to shake before applying so when I hear the ball bounce around in there, I am reminded to shake it first. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: RaeLee

customer_reviews.title: JACKPOT!
customer_reviews.text: I was on the lookout for a setting spray (Hotlanta!!!). Hit the jackpot with Coola!! I had received a sample bottle and was hooked after my first use. Makeup stays put, added bonus of a sunscreen, you can respray anytime to refresh and keep that sunscreen going. LOVE!!!! Amazon has the best pricing. Order it, you’ll love it.
customer_reviews.author: K REID-ALL

customer_reviews.title: I really love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin, I don't wear foundation and I am obsessed with sunscreen for my face. I've been trying new face SPF formulas and brands. I tried Coola's makeup setting sunscreen spray and I love it! I love that it sprays on light, dries quickly, doesn't cause my skin to become irritated and it's so easy to use. Fits in my purse for easy reapplication because you know you need to reapply after a few hours. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tee O

customer_reviews.title: Bottle leaks and spray leaves a sticky residue
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sunscreen that was really easy to use on the go so I could reapply before going out into the sun after work. I was keeping the sunscreen in my purse for a while but then I realized that it was leaking which was one part of the problem. It was easy to apply because of the spray but it would leave a very sticky residue everywhere and lasts the rest of the day. I was really hoping to enjoy this product but unfortunately I was sorely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sinit

customer_reviews.title: Very Drying
customer_reviews.text: I usually like COOLA sun protection products. I have had malignant melanoma three times, and I am religious about applying sunscreen. Unfortunately, I cannot recommend this product. I found it to be exceptionally drying. I would classify my skin and "normal", yet I cannot use it. I attempted to return it, but the product was not eligible for return. I would have gladly exchanged it for another COOLA product. Since I am unable to use the product, it was not money well-spent.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: burnt my face and neck caused major irritation to my skin
customer_reviews.text: burnt my skin causing blisters and very irritated and itchy skin.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Dickson

customer_reviews.title: ... sample of this in a monthly beauty box and liked it so much I bought the full size
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in a monthly beauty box and liked it so much I bought the full size. It really helps set my makeup and has an added bonus of SPF. I try to add as much SPF into my beauty routine as I can. You just need to make sure to keep your eye closed until the spray has settled as it does sting.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Added layer of sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it provides a matte finishing product for my make up with sunscreen protection. It has a slightly unusual alcohol smell when first applied but that is temporary. Nice product I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine W. McGregor

customer_reviews.title: Works well, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. Just a bit high on the price side. I like that it sets the make up well and preserves a dewy look of the skin after moisturizing and applying Illuminator- unlike powder setting. Just a bit high on the price side though for which a star is dropped. My moisturizer has sunblock but this stuff is so nice that I also use it to set my make up. With the added bonus of having extra sunscreen protection.
customer_reviews.author: Flamingo39

customer_reviews.title: Great for hot days!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for those hot days when sweating is inevitable. Holds makeup in place, includes SPF and is so refreshing when you spray it on. AND you can carry it on a plane.
customer_reviews.author: Stefany

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if this is the authentic Coola brand...
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased this same product from Ulta and there is a huge difference between that and what I just got in the mail. Firstly, the product I purchased before is in a glass bottle, sprays more evenly and smells better than this the one from Amazon in a plastic bottle. I question if this is the real thing or a knock off....
customer_reviews.author: Aubri Harlan

customer_reviews.title: Worked as promised!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Got it to use on family vacation to an amusement park where we'd be taking lots of family pictures in the hot hot sun! I passed it around to the whole family and we all loved it. As far as I know it didn't cause any breakouts, and everyone enjoyed the scent once the alcohol evaporated a bit. More importantly none of us got sunburnt faces and it kept us from getting too shiny in the photos. :D The only downside was one of the guys said it stung on his freshly shaved face. Not bad, just like aftershave, but unexpected, so watch out for that!
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is horrible. Smells like Estée Lauder's "Youth Dew" that all the old ladies used to wear. Also left my skin feeling sticky and tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended and cannot get refund
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this product. I wanted a “cleaner” version and when you spray this on your face it leaves a very greasy residue and makes the makeup easier to wipe off and run. Also smells horribly like chemicals and it will not allow you to return the product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely works!
customer_reviews.text: I had a sample of this product that I used on a weekend away hiking. The weather ended up being oppressively humid. I don't wear a lot of makeup except for mascara, eyeliner, and eyeshadow, but after using this, my makeup did not budge all day, even after A LOT of sweating, and I didn't have sunburn because of the built-in sun protection. The smell isn't great and you have to be sure to keep your eyes closed until the product dries, but after that- you're golden. I was SO pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Sherry Tabolt

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love this stuff. I originally received in a Fab/Fit box and gave it a try. Wow! I had never used a makeup setting spray (I'm a woman of a certain age, ok?) My skin is quite oily and by using this product I can go all day with out having to blot my face. It's a great product. Will continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NCKayaker

customer_reviews.title: Not what you think.
customer_reviews.text: I had an allergic reaction to the product once I took off my hat and my face was exposed to the sun while driving home. My face was so swollen the next morning, my eyes were practically swollen shut. Had to go to urgent Care and given meds to reduce the reaction. Missed 2 days of work. I was so disappointed in this product. Iʻve used others products like this ine before and have never had any allergic reactions. I wanted to return it but the site said this product was not eligible for returns.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Unique and wot,s well, okay for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use other sunscreen underneath so I can’t vouch for how it prevents sunburn, but this is such a novel product, I love it. It helps mattify and gives another layer of protection. The alcohol smell others have complained about is minor and dissipates quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take to the beach with you.
customer_reviews.text: Super disappointed with this spray. I bought for a vacation because I had heard great things. I took it to the back with me the first day and when I went to take it out of the bag in the afternoon this is what it looked liked. There was a white crusty film all Around the top and 70% of the product was gone. The writing on the outside looked cracked and was peeling off. I wouldn’t spend your money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for a product like this, what a great idea. Finally something you can spray over makeup in the summer to get some sun protection. I didn’t have any issues getting burned. Only thing is that there was a slight white film on my eyelashes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Best of both - spf & setting spray
customer_reviews.text: I love this HSA approved make-up setting spray plus SPF! The spf isn't the most efficient for your only method of sun protection, but I like to use along with my spf 50 moisturize, 30 spf foundation, and 3rd layer of the setting spray. It's amazing the health savings will over. Plus cruelty free!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Had to replace, but works great
customer_reviews.text: The first bottle I received wouldn’t spray. The nozzle was stuck. I contacted customer service and they sent a replacement right away. The replacement works great! I like the smell and it doesn’t affect my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L Doxtater

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible! It says organic yet it’s THE worst smelling setting spray I’ve ever used. I called Amazon to try to return it but since it’s flammable and I had to contact the seller, they couldn’t help and it became a whole ordeal so I gave up. Not worth the price, horrible product and it broke me out! Literally smells like nail polish remover! Never again!
customer_reviews.author: AZITA

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!
customer_reviews.text: I am skeptical of any good reviews out there on this product because it was so bad. Second most painful thing I've had in my eye (second to hand sanitizer), and I even had my eyes closed. Mattified my face to the point of me looking crazy, probably due to the pure smell of alcohol in this. Sprayer sucks. The only good thing I have to say is the packaging experience was lux. Will we ever get a good SPF spray to put over makeup? =[
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but has a strong alcohol-scent.
customer_reviews.text: I use the Urban Decay All Nighter setting spray on most work days, and on sunnier days, I use this Coola spray. It does what it's supposed to do, but just be aware that the scent can be overpowering. I actually repurchased it from another company after this initial Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lkimba75

customer_reviews.title: Hate it, stinky & sticky
customer_reviews.text: Smelled like nail polish remover and when I got a little in my hair it made it sticky and gross. Wanted to send it back but NO RETURNS policy. Bummer, I will never use this again & I can't send it back. Waste of $30
customer_reviews.author: LisaZ

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item came completely damaged. I was very disappointed because I love Coola’s BB cream. Less than 1/4 of the bottle was left after it spelled out and caked onto the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: The best setting spray hands down!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how well my make up lasts. It looks flawless. Love this product. It’s pricey, and I use it up fast but I absolutely love it. I need to not use so many sprays in my application but it’s so cooling that it feels great during the summer!!! It really isn’t any more expensive than UD. I think it’s the best setting spray I’ve ever used hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Overall, exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Overall I’m really happy with this product after using for a little over a week. This sunscreen/setting spray is very light and has the broad spectrum protection I was looking for. I was also wanting something as natural as possible and without synthetic fragrance so this has been perfect. I can also pay for it with my HSA. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: I want to like it
customer_reviews.text: It’s really just not for me. The product works well, sprays evenly, dries without messing up my makeup but it has alcohol in it and I think that’s what makes my face sting for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product at all. I don't think it helped my makeup stay on throughout the day like a setting spray should. It felt like I had a film on my face all day. I was afraid to touch my face in fear it would remove my makeup. I can't say if the SPF works as I only wore it twice. I couldn't bare to put it on my face again.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Ouch!!
customer_reviews.text: It stung my skin so much that I had to throw it away after one use. Burning skin every day does not = ‘it’s working,’ it = it’s damaging. :(
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Not the fine, delicate mist I envisioned
customer_reviews.text: Smells like hairspray and leaves a weird sticky, filmy residue wherever the mist lands (your shirt, hairline, etc). I had high hopes, but it does not meet them in the least.
customer_reviews.author: RMC

customer_reviews.title: Works well but smells like nail polish remover
customer_reviews.text: This spray works pretty well. It holds my makeup in place and isn't greasy. The only problem is that it smells like nail polish remover. It goes away pretty quickly, but it is not pleasant at all.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: sticky and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Very chemical scent and thick spray. Really sticky and tried to return item but was told because it was flammable liquid or gasses I cannot return. Well, why would I put that on my face!
customer_reviews.author: bernadette k.

customer_reviews.title: Product sprays too much product in one spray, using up the product quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I also really wanted to love this product. But unfortunately this product sprayed large glops of spray. I used this product occasionally for about 1 month and half. Now it’s done after only a few uses. Also the product smelled like alcohol. I had to apply this spray from the top because when I inhaled it I coughed. It stung and felt sticky. This product is not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: great setting spray
customer_reviews.text: I have malasma, so I use every product I can find to do double duty when it comes to makeup-all my products have some kind of spf quality from my bb to foundation and powder. This works perfectly as a lightweight setting spray to set my mineral powder, and it helps my makeup overall last all day. Great smell but not overpowering, not sticky once it has dried. Like with any setting spray, just be sure that your mascara is totally dry before using, and don't use before mascara as it may rub off if used in the wrong order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Packaging is lacking
customer_reviews.text: My sensitive oily skin loved this for the first few days until the spray bottle broke :( Never got a chance to really test its mettle as a sunscreen. Doesn't smell particularly strong, and whatever scent there is disappears pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Spilled out everywhere
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is now in a glass bottle with a better sprayer. I was excited to see this change. However, the sprayer doesn’t secure tightly to the bottle. My first day throwing this into my brand new Tory Burch bag, it opened EVERYWHERE. This was my staple piece for wanting a matte complexion, but it’s not worth the risk of it spilling onto your things.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette Wright

customer_reviews.title: Contains alcohol and burns!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize this contains alcohol! I’m usually an avid label reader because I’m allergic to soy and derivatives thereof. My face began burning about 30 minutes after the first application and dried it out. Horrible product. Will not purchase again. Very frustrated with companies adding soybean bi-products to their products. Blew my mind the first ingredient listed is alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Incredible bad. Not for sensitive skin, sticky and caused a major burn to my entire face after an hour walk outside.
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Broke
customer_reviews.text: The bottle broke the second time I used it. It has metal ball bearings in it. So when you shake it, so be gentle so you don't cut your hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Is worth every penny. I’ve used several different setting sprays And this one actually works !!! Even if I sweat my makeup stays on
customer_reviews.author: Nanci Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get past the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea and the convenience of this product. I'm just trying to get past the smell which is a mix of rubbing alcohol and tequila. :)
customer_reviews.author: Shiloh

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: I received a free bottle through something I subscribe to and I was hooked! It DOES work!
customer_reviews.author: KB shopper

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: Strong scent but disappears once mist has dried down on the skin. Mattifies my skin well!
customer_reviews.author: Jburrell

customer_reviews.title: Great sun protectant
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty pricey but I like the convinience of sun screen and mattifier in one. Smells great too. Is light weight and not sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Simply the Best
customer_reviews.text: Love that this products kills 2 birds with one stone. Its great at keeping my makeup looking fresh for hours and giving me the sun protection that I never used in the past. I used it daily and wish it came in a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and non greasy!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! Sets my makeup and keeps me protected from sun damage!!! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: C-Mama

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: This was not a great product. Strong smell of alcohol. Like rubbing alcohol. It dried my face out.
customer_reviews.author: TPowers00

customer_reviews.title: Great product but bottle leaks!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product on my skin but packaging needs improvement as bottle begins to leak after awhile!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly2758

customer_reviews.title: It you like your face to burn you'll love this
customer_reviews.text: Omg NOOOOOOOOO....This product burns almost EVERY TIME I use it. And I know you ask, "Then why use it?" Well "Richie rich" I spend over a 100 dollars. So refund will the a thing, like my upper lip being on fire was a thing
customer_reviews.author: Brent Polin

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my eyes.
customer_reviews.text: Apart from the fact that it irritated my eyes, the bottle just broke in my purse and made a mess. I used it for less than a month and won't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Hamideh Mohammadi

customer_reviews.title: Its a waste
customer_reviews.text: I actually like this product as a setting spray. It keeps my makeup in place and I feel like it offers good sun protection. HOWEVER, I've only been using it for a week and the bottle is halfway gone. I don't know if there is a leak or something but I've just been using it once daily to set my makeup and half the bottle is gone. So while it is a good setting spray, its a little ridiculous to spend over $30 on a bottle that might last a month.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Marcotte

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great! Perfect when doing my makeup. Works great! Make up always looks fresh.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Turned whites yellow
customer_reviews.text: It turned my white shirt yellow, where it got on it! 😕
customer_reviews.author: Joslyn321

customer_reviews.title: Leaky bottle...an 1/8 of the fluid gone!  Too expensive per fluid ounce to NOT return!
customer_reviews.text: For how much this Coola product costs per fluid ounce I will most definitely return for another bottle because 1/8 of the liquid leaked out! You can see the fluid line hits just below the SPF 30 circle and the liquid stains in the box.
customer_reviews.author: gregory crum

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, not going to lie I’ve slept in my makeup and it still looked good the next morning!
customer_reviews.author: Marcie Stopchinski

customer_reviews.title: Strong medicated smell
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the smell so I’m not able to rate the others potential qualities. Unable to return due to flammable materials
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Luckey

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Convenient. Easy to use, and not a cream! Goes well over makeup, doesn't mess it up, just remember to reapply!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! Works great. I've spent hours in the sun without getting a sunburn. Its just kinda expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Read the ingredient label and then choose lol
customer_reviews.text: Burned my face alive, not just mine I had 5 other friends try it lol then we looked at the ingredites... mostly alcohol... no wonder lol
customer_reviews.author: Charley Hensley

customer_reviews.title: Not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Trip to Florida, work very well. Not too heavy, in the humidity.
customer_reviews.author: RAGG LADY

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance is too strong
customer_reviews.text: There is an added Fragrance that makes me sneeze. I will not reorder this product. Beware if you are sensitive to strong smells.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: $36 and organic, but it burns like hell! I thought it was because I didn’t shake the bottle enough, but sprayed on my hands and it burned as equally. Be aware that the first ingredient listed is alcohol, meaning the content is high. No return policy, ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Rosa Proenza

customer_reviews.title: Sealed in perfection
customer_reviews.text: Love this setting spray. My makeup was flawless all day in the June San Antonio humidity. The smell is a little strong at first but it passes fast and the results are worth it
customer_reviews.author: TreRank

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my makeup in place!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! Got my first bottle in a Fab Fit Fun box and I've repurchased several times since. While the application is less than perfect (strong smell and spray is not as even as I would wish), I love how it keeps my makeup from transferring onto my clothes and the SPF is an added benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Book Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best thing since sliced bread haha I love this product! It is exactly what I had been looking for to use on my face. I have to always wear sunscreen on my face but hated how I couldn’t reapply after putting on makeup! Now I can! It works very well with no side effects or burning on my face.
customer_reviews.author: BChristenberry

customer_reviews.title: Stinky product beware!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to try this product out given the reviews, however the smell is just terrible!. It almost smells spoiled in a way. Not sure how it should smell, but I will not be buying or using this product again sadly.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Not like other Coola products
customer_reviews.text: I love Coola products, but this is greasy. Can’t return either. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I wish i could return this item
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this order for an extra hydration mist/additional SPF application throughout that day. The stuff seriously burns and smells TERRIBLE. 0/10 recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bell-kammeyer

customer_reviews.title: I love the products this brand has to offer
customer_reviews.text: I love the products this brand has to offer. Unfortunately, when I traveled, the liquid seeped all over. I bought a replacement since I was so disappointed I didn't have any left.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa Gango

customer_reviews.title: Not sure but only product I found for task
customer_reviews.text: Not great smell and not so sure about sun protection
customer_reviews.author: Xiomara Gana

customer_reviews.title: The alcohol burns when first applied
customer_reviews.text: Product was okay, it was a bit more sticky than i was expecting when it dries and the alcohol burns when first applied. I have sensitive eyes and it made them water a little bit. I liked that it had sun acreen but i dont plan on purchasing again. I was really hoping that i would’ve liked it more.
customer_reviews.author: momoftwo

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: Prior to purchasing I hadn’t heard of this. Loved this product! Light weights, smells great, and works!!
customer_reviews.author: katie watson

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: This works to set makeup, but I also had an allergic reaction resulting in an extremely swollen face, mainly around the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Orchell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Easy application and no geasy feel at all! I don't have any issues with the spray nob that others have stated. I have used it everyday as a sunscreen reapplication over makeup throughout the day and used up a half of the bottle in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Alexus N.

customer_reviews.title: It could be better
customer_reviews.text: I feel like the sun protection is there, it’s easy to carry around in a purse, car or leave at home but it smells a lot like alcohol and stings a bit, the first time, for a second or two, which was odd. Wish it wasn’t glass but other than that it’s fine. Pricey though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done as both spf and setting spray
customer_reviews.text: This stuff gets the job done, but I’m not impressed with how heavy it was. I’m still on the hunt for a good facial spf that doesn’t feel heavy or oily on my face
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent!
customer_reviews.text: I don't love how strong the scent is, other than that it works okay.
customer_reviews.author: Fellow AmazonPeep

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these. One for myself my two sisters and my two daughters. They all loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Moore

customer_reviews.title: It looks like the product contains alchogol
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product in July, but opened it a few weeks ago. When you spray it has a sharp smell of alcohol and causes tears in the eyes. The expensive product, but I couldn't either use or return it.
customer_reviews.author: Irina

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, protective, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for hot summer days and warm evenings wine tasting. It's lightweight and refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: CassieMae87

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my makeup in place, it has SPF, and it doesn't make my face oily!!
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all! I read about this online, and decided to give it a try. I love it, it keeps my makeup from fading, it has SPF, and it doesn't make my face look oily. These are biggies for me. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Sheldon

customer_reviews.title: Awful Scent
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, as I have struggled for years to find a facial sunscreen that I can tolerate. Unfortunately, this one is going in the trash. The scent is intolerable and it dries out the skin. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nastassja Cloughen

customer_reviews.title: It’s like a combination of sunscreen and bug spray
customer_reviews.text: It really stinks. It’s like a combination of sunscreen and bug spray. Not pleasant at all.

product_meta.title: COOLA Organic Makeup Setting Sunscreen Spray, Broad Spectrum SPF 30, 1.5 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Ready, set, go! A few mists of our organic Makeup Setting Spray SPF 30 keeps your 9 am face going until you call it a night. The weightless, matte-finish spritz helps makeup stay put and delivers a quick hit of hydration and sun protection anytime you need it. Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil

1
At COOLA, we're passionate about creating happy, healthy lifestyle experiences. We believe that clean beauty should feel as good as it is healthy, which is why we develop organic products that you'll love wearing every day.
